subject: Radio
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Steve Somers, who hosts a nightly call-in show on WFAN, is funny, even irreverent, about sports, and for many listeners that is part of the appeal.
snippet: Steve Somers, who hosts a nightly call-in show on WFAN, is funny, even irreverent, about sports, and for many listeners that is part of the appeal.
